description:
Don’t get left behind by the competition!

Nowadays, your business website has to deliver a high-quality web video, otherwise your competitors will out-do you. Make your business visible with your custom-fit Internet Marketing Video.


                           Why is an Internet Marketing Video such a great marketing tool?

Online video is fast becoming the most popular way for people to find information and services. YouTube alone has over 800 million unique users every month, and it is still growing. The percentage of website visitors who use mobile devices everywhere and at any time will increase rapidly as well.


                                                                It isn’t complicated

It’s like baking a cake: If you know the recipe, you cannot get it wrong. Unfortunately, some people are scared of technology. Actually, there is nothing to be scared of. You don’t need to be a specialist. All you need is to be an average computer user who doesn’t need to be impressed by the mumbo-jumbo of the big experts on the scene.


Firstly, you need comprehensive knowledge about your prospective customers.                          

Secondly, you need guidance through the entire procedure.


I will provide this guidance for you.  I developed this course from my own experience of creating an Internet Marketing Video, which was “zero” in the beginning. Now, you can watch my online course. I cannot offer better proof than this course.

I offer you a straight-forward video course for beginners that will walk you through how

                                                    plan, produce and upload

a professional looking video to your website. Learn how to create your own business video to communicate more effectively with your customers.

Suitable for any business regardless how big or small, this course offers a simple and cost effective way to make the most of this underused marketing tool. Learn to make an Internet Marketing Video the right way.


                            Create your first Internet Marketing Video ever for free

I will show you how you can save money by just using free trial programmes and equipment which you already own. This course will show you in four modules (7 section/ 28 lectures):

1.  Which programmes, tools and other resources you really need.

2.  What is necessary to know about technical equipment and how to use it.

3.  Basic knowledge about:

  -  Marketing

  -  Video Hosting and Video Strategy

  -  special web design for your Internet Marketing Video

4.  An answer to your question: Will this video stuff be the right thing for my business?

Don't be confused about modules and sections. I produced this course shortly before I met udemy. All lectures will go straight and logical forwards.


                                                 Why did I develop this course?

I have traditionally spent a lot of money on flyers and business cards, but all these methods are only good enough in certain situations. As the world has evolved, my business has needed to adapt the way my audience does business, and so my marketing strategy has evolved too.

I spent months and hundreds of hours performing studies and research on the internet. I found a lot of swaggering and even more mumbo-jumbo about internet marketing.

As a woman, I have my own approach to deal with technical issues, particularly with computer and software. I always look for a simple and fast way to do the job. It's not important or necessary to pose with my knowledge. I just do it and keep it as simple as possible.

I developed this online course "One Click Solution: How to create an Internet Marketing Video" for beginners. This course will explain everything what you need to create a Internet Marketing Video for any business or industry.

See you soon!
title: Increase Your Profit: Create an Internet Marketing Video
